metadata.title: CVE-2013-4420 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple directory traversal vulnerabilities in the (1) tar_extract_globand (2) tar_extract_all functions in libtar 1.2.20 and earlier allow remoteattackers to overwrite arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in a crafted tarfile.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4420` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtar0 - 1.2.20-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libtar package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.20-4').
